description: The trap is generated when a new network element is online.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeOnline H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeId s EXAM H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIpType i 0 H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIp s EXAMPLE H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnCompanyName s EXAMPLE H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnDeviceType s EXAMPLE H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnDeviceMac s EXAMPL

description: This is the network element ID uniquely identifying
one network element in the routing domain.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeId

description: This is the ip address type of the network element.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIpType

description: This is the ip address of the network element.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIp

description: The bridge MAC address of the network element.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnDeviceMac

description: The trap is generated when a network element is offline.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeOffline H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeId s EXAM H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIpType i 0 H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIp s EXAMPLE

description: This is the network element ID uniquely identifying
one network element in the routing domain.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeId

description: This is the ip address type of the network element.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIpType

description: This is the ip address of the network element.
variables.name: H3C-IPRAN-DCN-MIB::h3cIpRanDcnNeInfoNeIp
